definition: concerning or characterized by an appreciation of beauty or good taste, a philosophical theory attempting to explain and understand what is beautiful and why it might be considered that way
details:
adjective
- concerning or characterized by an appreciation of beauty or good taste
= example: concerning or characterized by an appreciation of beauty or good taste
= synonyms: aesthetical, esthetical
- pleasing in visually beautiful way
= synonyms: artistic
noun
- a philosophical theory attempting to explain and understand what is beautiful and why it might be considered that way
